gr.scriptum.eprotocol.mailclients
Class MailDispatcherConfig

java.lang.Object
  gr.scriptum.eprotocol.mailclients.MailDispatcherConfig

public class MailDispatcherConfig
extends java.lang.Object

Class that server Mail configuration, like mailer type, authentication It extends Authenticator so that it can be used in case the mail account is configured inside JBoss. For example using a jndi lookup session for eprotocol/mailer configuration

Author:
Mike Mountrakis mountrakis@uit.gr
